segments.text: I know I ’ m going to bite the dust going down this hill . I almost got killed on the chair lift ! This is going to be so embarrassing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . Everyone knows you ’ re getting your feet wet . I ’ ll show you how . I bet you ’ ll be proficient at this in five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is only your second time skiing . This is definitely a case of the blind leading the blind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Relax . I can hold my own . Now , point your skis toward the bottom of the hill . Easy does it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think I can get up enough nerve to do this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here . I ’ ll just give you a little push ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There . Now , wasn ’ t that fun ? As soon as you get a second burst of energy , we ’ ll ...
segments.speaker: S2
